mean_cn: v. 拖延，妥协，顺应时势，迎合潮流
mean_en: to avoid making a decision or giving a definite answer in order to have more time
word_etyma: tempor时间+ize使....化→时间化→挑战时间
short_phrase: temporize until they can go home
sentence: We only have to temporize for three more minutes before we can go home.
sentence_trans: 我们只需要再熬3分钟就可以回家了。
